entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who has never seen Aunt Petunia look at him in a certain way before. His eyes are opened to the fact that Aunt Petunia is his mother's sister, and he realizes she is fearful of Lord Voldemort's return.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as someone who has never looked at Harry in a certain way before. She is shown to be fearful of Lord Voldemort's return, and her usual pretense of disliking magic is dropped.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as someone who has returned, causing fear in Aunt Petunia. Harry has seen him and knows he came back a month ago.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as the person whose massive leather-clad shoulders Aunt Petunia clutched in fear.

relationships.description: Harry has a realization that Aunt Petunia is his mother's sister, and he sees her fear of Lord Voldemort's return.
Harry has encountered Lord Voldemort and knows he came back a month ago.
Aunt Petunia is afraid of Lord Voldemort's return, as shown by her fearful expression and behavior.
Aunt Petunia is clutching Dudley's massive leather-clad shoulders in fear.
